title: VitroMetrics Compliance
abstract:
IVDR enacted May 26, 2022
Requirement for post-market surveyance of all IVD
body:
• After the IVDR was enacted on May 26, 2022 all IVD manufacturers have been required to provide post-market surveyance of their devices
  • Evidence comes from disparate sources that are difficult to acquire and manage
  • Recurring verified testing evidence is readily available to manufacturers

title: VitroMetrics Audience
abstract:
IVD is a USD 117B market, which will grow to 128B by 2028
Compliance cost estimated at USD 3.5B â€“ 3% of revenues
Compliance market estimated at USD 900M
EQA (External Quality Assessment) data is fit for purpose
